title: Slow cooker pumpkin, carrot and pear soup
ingredients: ['1 medium pumpkin, peeled and cubed', '2 carrots, peeled and cubed', '2 large pears - peeled, cored and diced', '600ml vegetable stock', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 shallots, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 handful dried cranberries, finely chopped', 'creme fraiche, to serve']
